basics.name: Marek Włodarczyk
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Senior Software Developer  Specialties: Programming Informix(4gl), C++, Delphi, SQL Databases: Informix, Oracle, MongoDB

work.summary: Implementation and documentation of system components for Nordea Bank
Implementation and documentation of system components for Insurer

references.name: Bartosz Kozak
references.reference: I know Marek to be a very open, reliable and friendly person. He has an ability to build relationships with other people. He is the best Informix Software Developer I've ever met. He is interested in new technologies. In addtion, he is a great team member.

references.name: Jarosław Cichoń
references.reference: Marek is very ambitious developer, always willing to learn new things. His friendly attitude had good influence on the team. I wish him all the best in future challenges :)
